001
002package com.commercetools.http.okhttp3;
003
004import java.io.IOException;
005import java.util.*;
006import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
007import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
008import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
009import java.util.function.Supplier;
010import java.util.stream.Collectors;
011
012import okhttp3.OkHttpClient;
013import okio.GzipSource;
014import okio.Okio;
015
016import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
017import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.Utils;
018
019public class CtOkHttp3Client extends HttpClientBase {
020
021    public static final int MAX_REQUESTS = 64;
022    private final Supplier<OkHttpClient.Builder> clientBuilder = () -> new OkHttpClient.Builder()
023            .connectTimeout(120, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
024            .writeTimeout(120, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
025            .readTimeout(120, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
026            .protocols(Collections.singletonList(okhttp3.Protocol.HTTP_1_1))
027            .addInterceptor(new UnzippingInterceptor());
028
029    private final OkHttpClient okHttpClient;
030
031    public CtOkHttp3Client() {
032        super();
033        okHttpClient = clientBuilder.get().dispatcher(createDispatcher(MAX_REQUESTS, MAX_REQUESTS)).build();
034    }
035
036    public CtOkHttp3Client(final BuilderOptions options) {
037        super();
038        okHttpClient = options.plus(clientBuilder.get().dispatcher(createDispatcher(MAX_REQUESTS, MAX_REQUESTS)))
039                .build();
040    }
041
042    public CtOkHttp3Client(final Supplier<OkHttpClient.Builder> builderSupplier) {
043        super();
044        okHttpClient = builderSupplier.get().build();
045    }
046
047    public CtOkHttp3Client(final int maxRequests, final int maxRequestsPerHost) {
048        super();
049        okHttpClient = clientBuilder.get().dispatcher(createDispatcher(maxRequests, maxRequestsPerHost)).build();
050    }
051
052    public CtOkHttp3Client(final int maxRequests, final int maxRequestsPerHost, final BuilderOptions options) {
053        super();
054        okHttpClient = options.plus(clientBuilder.get().dispatcher(createDispatcher(maxRequests, maxRequestsPerHost)))
055                .build();
056    }
057
058    public CtOkHttp3Client(final ExecutorService executor) {
059        super(executor);
060        okHttpClient = clientBuilder.get().dispatcher(createDispatcher(executor, MAX_REQUESTS, MAX_REQUESTS)).build();
061    }
062
063    public CtOkHttp3Client(final ExecutorService executor, final BuilderOptions options) {
064        super(executor);
065        okHttpClient = options
066                .plus(clientBuilder.get().dispatcher(createDispatcher(executor, MAX_REQUESTS, MAX_REQUESTS)))
067                .build();
068    }
069
070    public CtOkHttp3Client(final ExecutorService executor, final int maxRequests, final int maxRequestsPerHost) {
071        super(executor);
072        okHttpClient = clientBuilder.get()
073                .dispatcher(createDispatcher(executor, maxRequests, maxRequestsPerHost))
074                .build();
075    }
076
077    public CtOkHttp3Client(final ExecutorService executor, final int maxRequests, final int maxRequestsPerHost,
078            final BuilderOptions options) {
079        super(executor);
080        okHttpClient = options
081                .plus(clientBuilder.get().dispatcher(createDispatcher(executor, maxRequests, maxRequestsPerHost)))
082                .build();
083    }
084
085    public okhttp3.Dispatcher createDispatcher(final int maxRequests, final int maxRequestsPerHost) {
086        final okhttp3.Dispatcher dispatcher = new okhttp3.Dispatcher();
087        dispatcher.setMaxRequests(maxRequests);
088        dispatcher.setMaxRequestsPerHost(maxRequestsPerHost);
089        return dispatcher;
090    }
091
092    public okhttp3.Dispatcher createDispatcher(final ExecutorService executor, final int maxRequests,
093            final int maxRequestsPerHost) {
094        final okhttp3.Dispatcher dispatcher = new okhttp3.Dispatcher(executor);
095        dispatcher.setMaxRequests(maxRequests);
096        dispatcher.setMaxRequestsPerHost(maxRequestsPerHost);
097        return dispatcher;
098    }
099
100    private static final String CONTENT_TYPE = "Content-Type";
101    private static final okhttp3.MediaType JSON = okhttp3.MediaType.parse("application/json; charset=utf-8");
102    private static final byte[] emptyBody = new byte[0];
103
104    @Override
105    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> execute(final ApiHttpRequest request) {
106        return makeRequest(okHttpClient, toRequest(request)).thenApplyAsync(CtOkHttp3Client::toResponse, executor());
107
108    }
109
110    private static ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> toResponse(final okhttp3.Response response) {
111        final ApiHttpHeaders apiHttpHeaders = new ApiHttpHeaders(response.headers()
112                .toMultimap()
113                .entrySet()
114                .stream()
115                .flatMap(e -> e.getValue().stream().map(value -> ApiHttpHeaders.headerEntry(e.getKey(), value)))
116                .collect(Collectors.toList()));
117
118        final ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> apiHttpResponse = new ApiHttpResponse<>(response.code(), apiHttpHeaders,
119            Optional.ofNullable(response.body())
120                    .map(Utils.wrapToCompletionException(okhttp3.ResponseBody::bytes))
121                    .orElse(null),
122            response.message());
123        if (apiHttpResponse.getBody() != null) {
124            response.body().close();
125        }
126        return apiHttpResponse;
127    }
128
129    private static okhttp3.Request toRequest(final ApiHttpRequest apiHttpRequest) {
130
131        okhttp3.Request.Builder httpRequestBuilder = new okhttp3.Request.Builder().url(apiHttpRequest.getUrl());
132
133        //set headers
134        for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : apiHttpRequest.getHeaders().getHeaders()) {
135            httpRequestBuilder = httpRequestBuilder.header(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
136        }
137
138        if (apiHttpRequest.getMethod() == null) {
139            throw new IllegalStateException("apiHttpRequest method should be non null");
140        }
141
142        //default media type is JSON, if other media type is set as a header, use it
143        okhttp3.MediaType mediaType = JSON;
144        if (apiHttpRequest.getHeaders()
145                .getHeaders()
146                .stream()
147                .anyMatch(s -> s.getKey().equalsIgnoreCase(CONTENT_TYPE))) {
148            mediaType = okhttp3.MediaType
149                    .parse(Objects.requireNonNull(apiHttpRequest.getHeaders().getFirst(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE)));
150        }
151
152        final okhttp3.RequestBody body = apiHttpRequest.getBody() == null ? null
153                : okhttp3.RequestBody.create(mediaType, apiHttpRequest.getBody());
154        httpRequestBuilder.method(apiHttpRequest.getMethod().name(), body);
155        return httpRequestBuilder.build();
156    }
157
158    private CompletableFuture<okhttp3.Response> makeRequest(final OkHttpClient client, final okhttp3.Request request) {
159        final okhttp3.Call call = client.newCall(request);
160        final OkHttpResponseFuture result = new OkHttpResponseFuture();
161        call.enqueue(result);
162        return result.future;
163    }
164
165    private static class OkHttpResponseFuture implements okhttp3.Callback {
166        public final CompletableFuture<okhttp3.Response> future = new CompletableFuture<>();
167
168        public OkHttpResponseFuture() {
169        }
170
171        @Override
172        public void onFailure(final okhttp3.Call call, final IOException e) {
173            future.completeExceptionally(e);
174        }
175
176        @Override
177        public void onResponse(final okhttp3.Call call, final okhttp3.Response response) throws IOException {
178            future.complete(response);
179        }
180    }
181
182    @Override
183    public void closeDelegate() throws IOException {
184        okHttpClient.dispatcher().executorService().shutdown();
185        okHttpClient.connectionPool().evictAll();
186        if (okHttpClient.cache() != null)
187            Objects.requireNonNull(okHttpClient.cache()).close();
188    }
189
190    public static class UnzippingInterceptor implements okhttp3.Interceptor {
191        @Override
192        public okhttp3.Response intercept(Chain chain) throws IOException {
193            okhttp3.Response response = chain.proceed(chain.request());
194            return unzip(response);
195        }
196
197        private okhttp3.Response unzip(final okhttp3.Response response) throws IOException {
198            if (!"gzip".equalsIgnoreCase(response.header("Content-Encoding"))) {
199                return response;
200            }
201
202            okhttp3.ResponseBody responseBody = response.body();
203            if (responseBody == null) {
204                return response;
205            }
206
207            GzipSource gzipSource = new GzipSource(responseBody.source());
208            okhttp3.Headers strippedHeaders = response.headers()
209                    .newBuilder()
210                    .removeAll("Content-Encoding")
211                    .removeAll("Content-Length")
212                    .build();
213            String contentType = response.header("Content-Type");
214            return response.newBuilder()
215                    .headers(strippedHeaders)
216                    .body(
217                        okhttp3.ResponseBody.create(okhttp3.MediaType.parse(contentType), -1L, Okio.buffer(gzipSource)))
218                    .build();
219        }
220    }
221}
